reviewText:
The description says "Secrets of Producing and Selling Successful Videos (Complete Course: Book, DVD and CD-ROM." and I received a "Legal Video Specialist" booklet and two CD's.
I bought this because I want to learn how to produce and sell videos, not to become a Legal Video Specialist. the material I received is a collection of legal documents (in a binded booklet) with a CD rom of the same documents and an instructional DVD of how to shoot video in courts.
Not at all what the product description says. not even close actually.
I will give it another shot just by ordering the book "Secrets of Producing and Selling Successful Videos."
